content: What the hell is this? When I went to get SSI/SSD I was told I make too much money. Too much money? Excuse me but I have been paying into SS since I was 15 years old and they just drop kicked me out the door. I couldn't hold down a job and even wound up in jail because I was a mental case. Too violent they said. I had to couch surf for 6 months or so before the VA got around to helping me. Now they are just handing it out to anyone even if you ran a paper clip through your finger....Bull Crap!!!

title: Social Security for Wounded Warriors

content: From your rant you have told us nothing. Now I see why SS turned you down.
reply: From your rant you have told us nothing. Now I see why SS turned you down.
title: Social Security for Wounded Warriors

content: Six years with USMC and the rest on submarines. Two knee surgeries, left shoulder surgery, left hand surgery, and a heart attack at 45 while I was still on active duty. I retired at 24 years. Want to know more? I think I have made my point. As far as a rant? Maybe, there are guys out there that are a lot worse off than I am. They are the ones that need the money, not me. I need very little to survive on and I am grateful that to have a roof over my head. There isn't much else in life I need to keep me happy.... I've learned its all a state of mind.
